index.name: John M. Wright
index.bio: As 17-year veteran of the software industry, I’ve gained development experience ranging from “shrink-wrapped” software to large, distributed networks using multiple platforms and technologies. I have a wide experience base with software development and management across the entire system lifecycle, including requirements gathering and analysis, architecture design, development, testing, and release. I have a pragmatic approach to and a heavy interest in continuous improvement of people, process, and product.
index.title: John M. Wright | Speakers | MKE DOT NET 2017
index.metaDescription: Speaker Bio for John M. Wright
